roleset.name: commit to memory
roleset.note: MEMORIZE-V NOTES: Someday I'll explain exactly what Kent Treble Bob Major is. (from memorize.01-v)

example.name: memorize-v: my favorite sentence in the whole corpus
example.text: Ringers memorize patterns of changes, known as ``methods,'' which have odd-sounding names like Kent Treble Bob Major or Grandsire Caters.
example.arg: patterns of changes, known as ``methods,'' which have odd-sounding names like Kent Treble Bob Major or Grandsire Caters

example.name: memorization-n
example.text: Sure, but you come ready with your memorization ready
